Key Match Events: Lane Thomas and José Ramírez hit back-to-back homers in the eighth inning to put the Rays away, 6-1.
Post-Match Reflections: The team is now 39-19 when Josh Naylor has at least one RBI.
Cleveland fans were ready to see their best hitters have life in their bats to get hot just in time for October to roll around.
Cleveland knows it will take more than just Ramírez and Naylor once the postseason rolls around. The club is hoping Saturday was a good start.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Naylor was 1-for-his-last-13 when he stepped in the batter’s box with the infield in and the bases loaded in the sixth inning.
Ramírez turned on a slider and sent it into the right-field seats just three pitches after Thomas hit his home run to left.
